name: Brian Viengthong
text: Great option and popular with the college crowd. Design your own pizza either with white or wheat crust. Gluten option available. Cooked in an open flamed oven and brought to your table within 5-7 minutes. Great flavor.

name: Hunter Bolte
text: The pizza is so very good and quite unique. Luckily the prices are not too crazy and they make the pizza pies quite quickly!

name: W James
text: It's hard to stop after one slice

name: Andrew Westberg
text: This is fast serve pizza.  Pick the crust type (thick or thin, white or wheat) pick your toppings and then have a seat.  Your pizza will be delivered in just a few min.  It comes in one size, which is a bit too big for one person and not …More

name: Darren Wacker
text: For chain pizza it's actually pretty good. they get you through pretty quick, fill you up and get you out the door. As an added bonus they also have beer.

name: Nick N
text: Amazing Pizza hands down. But me and some friends went there to do the Tuesday 2 for $12.50 deal, which is a steal for this pizza. Anyways, we got there saw the sign about it asked one of the employees behind the counter about it and they …More

name: Allison Gisch
text: Pizza was delicious and cooked fast! We brought our two little kids inside and our 3 year old enjoyed picking out his own pizza.

name: Jared Pudwill
text: Was a great place to get pizza, but it suddenly closed. 1000 Degrees on Madison is similar to Pieology for those who liked it.

name: Mikayela Barden
text: Love the concept and always is delicious. They have so many different varieties of sauces, meats, toppings that anyone could ask for. First time can be intimidating, but staff is considerate and patient.

name: Robert Fischer
text: Tasty pizza, friendly people, and pleasant atmosphere. Nice place to on a date or with your family.

name: Sharlyn Sherman
text: Was loving this place till they unexpectedly closed for good.

name: Dollis Scheele
text: This is my favorite pizza place. You can select a pizza from a menu or select a crust, oil, sauce, many cheeses, many toppings, whatever you want. Love it.

name: john mikkalson
text: Love this place. Great service and amazing ingredients for a reasonable price.

Quality ingredients, a variety of choices, and prices that don't break the bank. These pizzas aren't giant but once you load them up with toppings you'll be busting at the seams. Be sure and get an order of cheese bread if you are in a group, that stuff is amazing.

name: PAIGE ATHERTON
text: Every time I go I get great service and great pizza!

name: Mariah Ketelsen
text: The gluten free crust option offered here is super good, and they have Daiya cheese (vegan)!!! Not to mention some of the hometown brewery options for beer. Super impressed, definitely made my day stopping here for lunch. The staff was also super friendly and helpful.

name: J.V. Garibay
text: My new favorite pizza place! I'm Paleo so hard to find a grain free crust option and tried the new cauliflower crust it was AWESOME had a chkn alfredo pizza loved it! Staff are friendly and helpful. The brick oven is quick and the size of …More

name: Nathan Johnson
text: Amazing, fresh great tasting food, smiling happy faces, what's not to love about this place!!

name: Robert Draper
text: Very good personal pizzas at a great price. Toppings are no additional cost. Location is very casual, almost like a fast food chain.

name: Lance Johnson
text: Well managed restaurant. Best build-your own pizza place.

name: George
text: Delicious pizza, online order was all done right and ready when went to pick up.

name: David Stewart
text: Individual pizzas made with exactly what you want on them. Will even add extra to it for you for no extra charge. Reasonably priced, quick, and very tasty.

name: John Mantor
text: My favorite pizza ever, I go there every time I get the the chance, quick, crispy, small, and delicious.

name: Helena Stevens
text: The food is great and the servers are friendly . Wait time is low and the food is hot and fresh.

name: Amber Pietan
text: Great pizza! Get goat cheese! Way better than daya cheese! It's not vegetarian bit it's dairy free! Offer both! So yummy

name: Jeff Everest
text: Great individual sized pizzas. It's like a pizza version of subway.

name: Tracy Muhlenbeck
text: Delicious, fast, great service. Could be cleaner.

name: Kyle Johnson
text: Amazing delicious if you haven't tried it go now

name: Kyle Luhmann
text: It's good pizza, but dont order online. Every time I've done it, I show up and it's not done because the slip doesnt print/go through. I understand once or something messes up but it's been quite a few times. If I wanted to wait, I'd just not order online.

name: Tom Bicek
text: Really great pizza. Either order off the menu, or design your own pizza.

name: Steven J. Kind
text: Make your own pizza and have it in your hands in about ten minutes for ten bucks...gotta love it!  Wide variety of options for your pizza along with a very accommodating staff.

text: Didn’t think the pizza tasted good. Personal preference. Service was ok.

text: I dont know how the hell you managed to burn my pizza and give me food poisoning

text:
Their regular crust is their deep dish crust.

And they said that Californians get mad at them. I don't think that any people from California come here.

text: Kaitlyn was rude and disrespectful. I came in for their Father's Day special and asked if I could use the coupon though I didn't have my kids with me. The lady I asked was nice and said yes, as long as you show the coupon at checkout. Had …More

name: Jake P
text: being able to create your own custom pizza is a nice change of pace. I've been to pieology atleast 10 times now and have loved the food. The employees have provided friendly and good service.  Why the 2 stars?? …More

text: The first time we ever went here the pizza was great--beer wasn't as cold as it should have been but the pizza made up for it. …More

name: Josh Biber
text: Their pizzas are seriously delicious. No matter what you put on the pizza, it is almost certain to come out delicious! The inside of the store is very avant-garde and trendy. Not to mention the wait staff are always in a good mood, …More

name: Alex Beck
text: A good idea but not greatly executed. The ordering style was kind of difficult and not as self explanatory as I was hoping.

name: Merissa Ferraro

name: paris smith
